TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EndpointIdentity extends System.Object

summary.span: 一个抽象类，实现此类后可提供一个标识，与终结点交换消息的客户端可以使用该标识对终结点进行身份验证。

span.span: An abstract class that when implemented provides an identity that enables the authentication of an endpoint by clients that exchange messages with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可使用 的构造函数来设置终结点标识的值，在此构造函数中，该值可作为只读 属性进行访问。The value of the identity for an endpoint can be set with constructors of , where its value can also be accessed as a read-only property.

span.span: A DNS associated with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此标识连接到终结点的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 客户端将验证由服务器提供的声明是否包含一个表示此标识的 DNS 声明。A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a DNS claim that represents this identity. 此静态方法通过调用其构造函数 创建 的实例。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。The following code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[S_UEEndpointIdentity#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueendpointidentity/cs/source.cs#41)]

summary.span: 创建一个 RSA 标识。

span.span: Creates an RSA identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此标识连接到终结点的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 客户端将验证在服务器提供的众多声明中是否具有一个包含用于构建此标识的 RSA 公钥的声明。A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a claim that contains the RSA public key used to construct this identity. 这些静态方法之一通过调用其构造函数 创建 的实例。One of these static methods creates an instance of by calling its constructor .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity CreateSpnIdentity(string spnName) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateSpnIdentity (spnName As String) As EndpointIdentity

span.span: The name for the SPN identity.

summary.span: 使用指定名称创建服务器主体名称 (SPN) 标识。

span.span: Creates a server principal name (SPN) identity with a specified name.

returns.span: 一个与特定的 关联的 SPN 。

span.span: An SPN associated with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此标识连接到终结点的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 客户端在使用终结点进行 SSPI 身份验证时将使用 SPN。A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the SPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint. 此静态方法通过调用其构造函数 ，并使用 作为输入参数创建 `spnName` 的实例。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor, , using `spnName` as the input parameter. 如果使用空字符串指定 `spnName`，则一旦可能，身份验证将从 Kerberos 回退到 NTLM。If `spnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible. 如果 为 `false`，则身份验证失败。If is `false`, authentication fails. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。The following code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[S_UEEndpointIdentity#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueendpointidentity/cs/source.cs#12)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity CreateUpnIdentity(string upnName) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateUpnIdentity (upnName As String) As EndpointIdentity

span.span: The name for the UPN identity.

summary.span: 使用指定名称创建用户主体名称 (UPN) 标识。

span.span: Creates a user principal name (UPN) identity with a specified name.

returns.span: 一个与指定的 关联的 UPN 。

span.span: A UPN associated with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此标识连接到终结点的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 客户端在使用终结点进行 SSPI 身份验证时将使用 UPN。A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the UPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint. 此静态方法通过调用其构造函数 ，并使用 作为输入参数创建 `upnName` 的实例。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor, , using `upnName` as the input parameter. 如果使用空字符串指定 `upnName`，则一旦可能，身份验证将从 Kerberos 回退到 NTLM。If `upnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible. 如果 为 `false`，则一旦使用 NTLM，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 将尽最大努力引发异常。If is `false`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] makes a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used. 请注意，将此属性设置为 `false` 可能不阻止通过网络发送 NTLM 凭据。Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何调用此方法。The following code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[S_UEEndpointIdentity#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueendpointidentity/cs/source.cs#30)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 创建一个 X509Certificate 标识。

span.span: Creates an X509Certificate identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基于是否拥有支持证书在这两个构造函数中进行选择。Choose between these two constructors based on whether you have supporting certificates. 通过此标识连接到终结点的安全 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 客户端将验证服务器提供的声明中是否具有一个包含用于构造此标识的证书指纹的声明。A secure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the claim that contains the thumbprint of the certificate used to construct this identity.
